resources.string: We believe that yoga can make everyone life happier, healthier and more balanced. From Asia and North America with both professional and passionate professional team, Pure Yoga provides the most excellent courses, facilities and environment, hope to inspire all ages and all kinds of physical mass, let yoga become part of their lives

To enhance physical fitness and cleansing of the spirit of the land in the downtownPure Yoga Pure Yoga in various Asian cities, including Hongkong, Shanghai, Singapore and Taipei, the core area has a yoga center. We also have the whole world in view, and American fitness brand Equinox cooperation in New York opened a yoga center.

Pure Yoga is committed to the integration of Yoga communities in Asia and beyond. Yoga Center offers more than 1600 courses a week. Nearly 200 certified professional instructors from around the world to bring diversified experience. Pure Yoga encourages mentors to receive continuing education, regular seminars and in-house training, such as Maha Kula Gathering, and a scholarship and internal mentoring program (mentor). We also encourage instructors to continue to participate in the global learning courses.

Only within two days of the course

This kind of characteristic curriculum emphasizes the balance and coordination of the body. Most people body is somewhat unbalanced, and the imbalance will lead to stress and fatigue. This class will help students find out that they do not coordinate, make the body stronger, softer and more balanced. By balancing the exercise, students can enhance focus, core strength, and stability. This course may contain some breathing exercises, chanting and meditation. Suitable for students who have little experience in yoga practice, the course will bring exciting and enjoyable experience. This course does not contain complete inverted exercises, but will teach in 2 degree and inverted action preparation, and to lay the foundation for future practice, enable students to steady growth, after successfully advanced to the 2 degree courses.
